item.title: How i make the codes
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOUR NAME HERE”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOUR NAME HERE”)) {

String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}[/code]

Here you go
Tell me if you have any problems it might work though

Read full topic
